video.description:
Tangle is chaos. The film documents Trash Talk while on a week long tour throughout Japan. Utter sleep deprivation, culture shock and excessive drugs. We snaked through the streets, down flights of stairs and into the underground hardcore shows of Japan. Tokyo, Osaka, Nagoya and Enoshima blended together into one incoherent night. In these dark rooms, the polite and calm surface of Japan is ripped away. It is a study of these two worlds meetings. The jumping back and forth between the light and the dark show how these contrasting forces are actually interdependent. 

View photos here: http://will.xhbtr.com/keep_digging

Made by Among Other Things - https://aotprojects.com
video.title: Trash Talk: Tangle Film

video.description:
Maxim Havlicek is a Los Angeles based painter. Originally born in Czechoslovakia during the communist regime, he turned to painting as a means of freedom and emotional expressionism.


Director: Will Mayer
Director of Photography: Ian Rigby
Producer: Isaac Karsen
Editor: Chris Amos
Colorist: Tyler Roth
Steadicam: Thomas Fedak
1st AC: Allan Chavarria
Score: Karel Havlicek

EP: Will Mayer & Kosta Elchev @ http://PRMRY.co
See more of Maxim's art http://maximhavlicek.com/

video.description:
Over 100,000 girls play youth baseball, but only 1,000 girls play high school baseball. Baseball For All is a nonprofit providing girls meaningful opportunities in baseball. Founded by Justine Siegal, the first woman to coach for a MLB organization.
--
Director: Will Mayer
Produced by http://PRMRY.co
Exec. Creative Director: Robin Fitzgerald
DP:  Jamie Niebuhr
AC/Cam Op: Joe Miller
Editor: Andy Green @ Cut+Run
Color: Gregory Reese @ The Mill
Music: IAMBENJI
Mix: Lime
http://baseballforall.com
